# tgit

[![CodeTime Badge](https://img.shields.io/endpoint?style=social&color=222&url=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.codetime.dev%2Fshield%3Fid%3D2%26project%3Dtgit%26in=0)](https://codetime.dev)

Tool for managing git repositories.

## Installation

```bash
pip install tgit
```

## Usage

```bash
tgit --help
```
